      • handleLoginButtonAction

        public void handleLoginButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        This method handles the login button action event. It transfers the user screen to the login view.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - Accepts ActionEvent.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an input or output exception occurred.
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • handleRegisterButtonAction

        public void handleRegisterButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
                                throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method handles the register button action event. It gets the user entered data and makes the proper validations. If the entered details are correct, it saves the user data to the database, creates an new UserSessionController instance and transitions the user screen to the appropriate dashboard.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - Accepts ActionEvent.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If an SQL error occurred.
        Since:
        1.0.0
